    About us

    Contact

We are Winify

A staff of 85 employees – offices in Germany, Switzerland, Poland, Moldova, and Australia

We are experts

Mobile apps & websites, payment systems, E- & M-Commerce, social platforms

We develop software

All relevant programming languages, product & project management, quality assurance, administration & service

We are experts in all leading programming languages and software solutions. We will tailor them to suit your specific requirements. And add a good deal of creativity. Because only ideas which stand out from the crowd will be extraordinarily successful. Our solutions delight. They are highly appealing and can be operated intuitively.

  • Software Development
    We develop efficient and safe software, websites, and apps.
  • Project Management
    We are not satisfied with our project management until you feel well-informed and certain.
  • Quality Assurance
    The Winify testing und QA programme will accompany your project from the very beginning to the final handover.
  • Design
    Together we will develop an individual service which will meet all your needs and wishes – from database management to the design of the logo.
  • Administration
    We will ensure that your service works perfectly. 24/7 on every day of the year.

Software is not an end in itself. Software is a digital tool to an end. The reason you want new software or a new website is that you want to achieve an objective. And of course you want be successful by doing so. That is exactly how we see it: We are driven by the wish to produce solutions which will help our customers to succeed.

Your customers like your website.
Your earnings are good.
Winify has done a good job.

Doing a good job means that we will invest all our experience, all our know-how, and all our creativity. We want to achieve the best for our customers: state-of-the-art websites and software solutions, user-friendly designs & high usability levels, automatically converting online shops, and much more. Too many buzzwords? Please scroll down a bit to find our contact box. Let us get in touch, we are always glad to specify.

Working with Winify has always been a pleasure. Over time we have developed a personal as well as professional relationship. We feel very much at ease. Winify is always willing to respond to comments and criticisms. We discuss as equals. This way, we are sure to get the best results.
Cashless Nation AG
We started with a rather small job for Winify AG and were very satisfied. As a result, we have been gradually intensifying our cooperation. Today, Winify is our most important software and product partner.
MUUME AG
For three years now we have been cooperating with Winify in different projects. Their competence in the field of payment and everything that has to do with it is remarkable
Dr. Felix Hötzinger, CEO, Demekon Entertainment AG
Several of our portfolio companies are or have been Winify customers – some for shorter periods, some for more than a year. For us, Winify is a very valuable and important partner.
Volker Rofalski, Mountain Partners Group
